section.section: This section does not apply in Montgomery County.

Except for child support enforcement, a local director shall administer the social service and public assistance activities in the county in accordance with Title 4, Subtitle 2 and Title 5, Subtitle 2 of this article.

text.section: A local director has a general administrative responsibility to the Social Services Administration and the Family Investment Administration.
